BBEX3.A.XPF.USD.CM.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the US dollar in New Caledonia / USD 1 = XPF ...
General: CFP was originally the abbreviation for "Colonies Françaises du Pacifique" and is still used as a currency symbol (in connection with the franc).

Methodology: We do not have any data on US dollar exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the exchange rate for the euro in New Caledinia (XPF 1000 = EUR 8.38) in conjunction with the respective annual average euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
